built.subTitle: BUILT ON ETHEREUM
built.title: Secure and transparent
text: The rising global demand for cryptocurrencies calls for a compliant infrastructure platform and a legal framework that seamlessly connect brick & mortar investments with cryptocurrencies.

It uses smart contracts to handle micro as well as big investments thus offering lower fees and better prices than traditional banks. Users get an asset-backed token with a unique denomination after each investment.
